supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774 - The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: A. “End Items,” “Equipment,” “Accessories,” “Attachments,” “Parts,” “Components,” and “Systems”
0A501 Firearms (except 0A502 shotguns) and related commodities as follows (see List of Items Controlled)

Specific “parts,” “components,” “accessories” and “attachments” “specially designed” for a commodity subject to control in this ECCN or common to a defense article in USML Category I and not elsewhere specified in the USML or CCL as follows, and “parts,” “components,” “accessories,” and “attachments” “specially designed” therefor.
